<url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;ba6f7d83.1502">   <title>Academic Advising and Personal Tutoring Conference \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 25 March 2015</title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;ba6f7d83.1502</link>   <description> Dear Everyone<br><br>I'm sorry for any cross-posting, but I wanted to make you aware of the following event:<br><br>Academic Advising and Personal Tutoring Conference \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 25 March 2015<br><br>The University of Sheffield is proud to host the launch of a UK Allied Group of NACADA through a one-day conference event on the 25th of March, 2015. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-26T15:29:40+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Ida Kemp</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;ba6f7d83.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;7df62849.1501">   <title>External Examiner required for Humanities Modular programme </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;7df62849.1501</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues<br><br>The University of Hertfordshire (UH) is seeking an external examiner for its modular Humanities programme starting in September 2015. This is a Programme wide rather than subject specific post. The Humanities programme at UH has four majors: English Literature, English Language, History and Philosophy and fourteen minors/joints including Languages and media-related subjects such as Media Cultures and Film and Creative Writing. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-27T15:44:08+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>St-John, Judy</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;7df62849.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;f11f5283.1501">   <title>Interdisciplinary meeting 16th January </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;f11f5283.1501</link>   <description> Just to keep you updated about the (new) inter-disciplinary group meeting I mentioned recently, the draft agenda has just come out:<br><br>DRAFT AGENDA<br><br>10.00 Welcome<br><br>10.05 Presentation 1: International Comparative Research (title tbc) - Camille Kandiko-Howson: Kings College London<br><br>11.05 Presentation 2: BASc Degree Programme (title tbc) - Carl Combrich: UCL<br><br>12.05 Lunch to include short informal presentation by Dr Machiel Keestra, Interdisciplinary Studies Institute University of Amsterdam and incoming President of the International Studies Association (first European President) [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-07T12:23:30+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Dobson, Mike</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;f11f5283.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;455de7e7.1501">   <title>Forthcoming inter-disciplinary meeting on January 16th </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;455de7e7.1501</link>   <description> For info, meeting of the inter-disciplinarity group - please see below.<br><br>Apologies for cross-posting.<br><br>All Best Wishes<br>Mike    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-05T15:12:23+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Dobson, Mike</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;455de7e7.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;6a754223.1501">   <title>Re: combinedhonours.ac.uk website </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;6a754223.1501</link>   <description> Andy,<br><br>I like the redesign of the combined honours website. A suggestion - perhaps add some pictures to increase visual appeal?<br><br>All Best Wishes<br>Mike   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-05T13:37:36+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Dobson, Mike</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;6a754223.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;d34e0e3f.1501">   <title>combinedhonours.ac.uk website </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;d34e0e3f.1501</link>   <description> Hello everyone,<br><br>Hope you all had an enjoyable festive break.<br><br>I just wanted to make you all aware that the combinedhonours.ac.uk website has been revamped and will be regularly monitored to ensure that all the information is up to date. I think the website will be a great way for prospective students to receive general information about combined honours courses so I would be grateful to hear any feedback/suggestions you have regarding the site. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-05T12:21:04+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Andrew Pearson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;d34e0e3f.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;34f2f834.1411">   <title>HEAR recognition for joint/combined/dual programmes </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;34f2f834.1411</link>   <description> Dear Everyone<br><br>At one of our network meetings there was a discussion about whether we might include a general statement on the HEAR (Higher Education Achievement Report) which would reflect additional skills that joint/dual/combined/ honours students might have.<br><br>Has anyone done this? Our team here is not sure that it actually meets criteria as set out under section 6.1 and I was wondering if anyone had addressed this issue already. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-28T11:07:19+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Ida Kemp</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;34f2f834.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;37027cfb.1411">   <title>External Panel member sought for Periodic Review of Mass Communications Programme, University Of Hertfordshire </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;37027cfb.1411</link>   <description> External Panel member sought for Periodic Review of Mass Communications Programme (Framework only)<br>Hi,<br>I am looking for a suitable academic to appoint to the role of External Panel Member for the above Periodic Review. A suitable person will be familiar with the structure of a modular programme and ideally have experience working in the field of mass or media communications.<br>The review will take part as several meetings on 16th March 2015. Documentation will be posted to panel members on around 16th Feb 2015. Meetings include student meetings, development team meetings and senior managers meeting. A decision will be [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-24T17:21:50+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>St-John, Judy</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;37027cfb.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;9ed11119.1411">   <title>Re: HEA invitation to tender re interdisciplinary provision </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;9ed11119.1411</link>   <description> Helen,<br><br>Thanks for mentioning this. I had not seen it. Very interesting development!<br><br>All Best Wishes<br>Mike    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-12T15:25:14+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Dobson, Mike</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;9ed11119.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;640857b.1411">   <title>Employability of Combined Honours Graduates </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;640857b.1411</link>   <description> Dear friends,<br><br>Attached is a summary of my pilot study on CH employability<br><br>Best regards<br><br>Roy   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-12T07:50:52+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>SMITH ROY</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;640857b.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;eb2ae81d.1411">   <title>Impact of CH degrees on employment </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;eb2ae81d.1411</link>   <description> Dear friends If anyone is interested in developing further the pilot I talked about yesterday please drop me a line. I'm happy to do the analysis of further responses but will rely on others to get a decent spread of alumni. People seemed happy to use my very open question but I am amenable to suggestions for amendments. I'll circulate a summary of what I talked about shortly. It was nice to establish contact with the network Roy   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-11T17:46:53+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Mr Roy K Smith</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;eb2ae81d.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;bae9a51e.1411">   <title>Combined Honours Provision report </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;bae9a51e.1411</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>At the Spring meeting we mentioned that we had engaged one of our Associate Lecturers to undertake a benchmarking exercise around combined honours provision in the UK. This was only a short contract and I suspect may not have captured absolutely everything but it certainly gave us a flavour of how differently institutions promote and name their combined/joint/interdisciplinary qualifications. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-11T11:45:56+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Helen.Cooke</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;bae9a51e.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;7ce420f4.1411">   <title>LinkedIn group for Combined Honours Network </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;7ce420f4.1411</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>Apologies for the 'flurry' of emails following yesterday's event!<br><br>I have now set up a group on LinkedIn for those that wish to connect in that way. Whilst the Jisc mailing list still obviously has its benefits, a few of a felt that a LinkedIn group may help to keep all our thoughts and discussions in one place. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-11T11:17:01+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Helen.Cooke</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;7ce420f4.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;9f9bf44a.1411">   <title>Re: HEA invitation to tender re interdisciplinary provision </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;9f9bf44a.1411</link>   <description> Dear Helen<br>I am sad that I missed yesterday- hope ii was all productive.<br>I missed that call...and I suspect there was only a short window to tender. I was thinking at one of the other calls which involved the same timescale - less than 3 weeks.<br>But I will get in touch with the HEA about this in order to encourage them to direct the winning tender to contact us as we provide a high volume of such provision....<br>All best<br>Colin [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-11T08:52:37+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Colin Bryson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;9f9bf44a.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;34c8f3b9.1411">   <title>HEA invitation to tender re interdisciplinary provision </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;34c8f3b9.1411</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>Following on from our discussions at yesterday's meeting, I wondered if anyone was aware of the following Invitation to Tender on interdisciplinary provision recently advertised by the HEA (I only found it last night and the deadline was last Friday!)?<br><br>https://www.heacademy.ac.uk/funding-call/interdisciplinary-provision-higher-education-current-context-and-future-challenges<br><br>It might be interesting to keep an eye on how this develops, perhaps HEA are using this to assess whether/how to support interdisciplinarity in future... Does anyone know if their institution has submitted a proposal...? [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-11T08:35:57+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Helen.Cooke</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;34c8f3b9.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;33671e18.1411">   <title>Notes from Liberal Arts Conference </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;33671e18.1411</link>   <description> Dear Everyone<br><br>Further to today's meeting, below, please find some notes from the Liberal Arts Conference held at KCL in October.<br><br>Report from \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdThe Future of Liberal Arts\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Conference<br>14 October 2014<br>Kings College London<br>The event was organised by Martin Robinson and Aaron Rosen. It was supported by the THES and Kings College London. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-10T20:45:14+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Ida Kemp</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;33671e18.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;8ad7a9f9.1411">   <title>Academic Advising Event in March </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;8ad7a9f9.1411</link>   <description> Further to today's meeting, please find information about the UK Academic Advising event in March.<br><br>http://www.nacada.ksu.edu/Events-Programs/Events/International-Conference/UK-Drive-In-Event.aspx<br><br>UK Drive-In Event<br><br>25 March 2015, University of Sheffield, UK<br><br>The University of Sheffield is proud to host the first UK Drive-In at the iconic Arts Tower. This one-day event will feature academic advising issues in a UK and European context and be an ideal launch for further networking and co-ordination activities. In addition, guest speakers, including Charlie Nutt, Executive Director of NACADA, will be in attendance. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-10T20:38:12+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Ida Kemp</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;8ad7a9f9.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;622da7d5.1411">   <title>Apologies for today's meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;622da7d5.1411</link>   <description> Louise,<br><br>With sincere apologies, I won't be able to attend today's Combined Honours Network meeting. My wife has gone down with a sickness bug during Sunday night. We have two small children to look after and take to school etc, so I'm afraid I am going to have to stay in Exeter. Added to that, I took my aged mother into hospital in Exeter on Friday with a blocked stomach and she is in for tests. I hope I have not brought home a bug from the hospital! [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-10T05:40:34+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Dobson, Mike</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;622da7d5.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;fcf83973.1411">   <title>External Examiner Vacancy-University of Hertfordshire </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;fcf83973.1411</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues<br><br>We are currently looking for an External Examiner for the Joint Honours degree programme at the University of Hertfordshire. The post is for this academic year through to the end of the academic year 2017-18.<br>It involves coming to our programme (Exam) Boards towards the end of June and then again at the end of July (referral/deferral Board) and overseeing that process. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-05T12:18:27+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>St-John, Judy</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;fcf83973.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;a641179.1410">   <title>External Examiner vacancy </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;a641179.1410</link>   <description> Dear colleagues<br>We are currently looking for an external examiner/assessor for the combined Honours degree at Newcastle. The post will start at the end of January (so includes this academic year) through to the end of the academic year 2017-18.<br>It involves coming to our main Board at the end of June and overseeing that process, plus oversight of the CH modules (currently 5 of these with a 6th in the pipeline).<br>Please contact me if you are interested.<br>All best<br>Colin [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-31T11:52:02+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Colin Bryson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;a641179.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;f5c31051.1410">   <title>Re: Monday 10 November meeting of the Combined and Joint Honours Network </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;f5c31051.1410</link>   <description> Dear Louise<br><br>Many thanks for this. I'm very much looking forward to it. I'll hope to arrive by 9.45, but can't come the night before, as I'm in London, so have to travel by train from Leeds that morning. Dr Beeching of blessed memory closed the station at Otley, where I live, so it's sometimes a bit tricky to get early trains from Leeds. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-23T09:35:22+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Penny Robinson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;f5c31051.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;f3843037.1410">   <title>Monday 10 November meeting of the Combined and Joint Honours Network </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;f3843037.1410</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>We are very much looking forward to welcoming you to the University of Derby on Monday 10 November 2014 for the Combined and Joint Honours Network Autumn meeting.<br><br>I have attached the agenda.<br><br>Please let me know if:<br>1. You have any special dietary requirements<br>2. You would like a car parking space reserved \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd if so, please let me know your car registration [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-21T14:48:29+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Louise Pigden</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;f3843037.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;c9617596.1410">   <title>Monday 10 November meeting of the Combined and Joint Honours Network </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COM-JOINT-FLEX-NET;c9617596.1410</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>We are very much looking forward to welcoming you to the University of Derby on Monday 10 November 2014 for the Combined and Joint Honours Network Autumn meeting.<br><br>I have attached the agenda, and if you wish to attend and didn't participate in the Doodle poll, just let me know. There are suggestions for hotel accommodation below. If colleagues require parking, can you please let me know so I can organise visitor permits? I will send round the confirmed agenda and timings shortly, along with instructions for where and when to report. Look forward to welcoming you on Monday 10 November at the University of Derby! Hotel Accommodation Regarding accommodation, we would recommend the Hallmark Hotel, because it\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds right next to Derby train station: http://www.hallmarkhotels.co.uk/our_hotels/derby/ . This is 4 star accommodation.
